Welcome.title: Service Configuration
Welcome.text:
Thank you for choosing OpusCapita Business Network! To integrate buyers, suppliers and other business partners, the Business Network service needs to be conÔ¨Ågured.

This is a setup service to help you get up and running. The setup service will provide you information depending on the services you select.

label.dontShowAgain: Do not show this page again.

BuyerInformation.notExists: Buyer does not exist! Please register first.

unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved Changes
unsavedChanges.text: You did not save your entries. Do you want to proceed without saving?

profileStrength.heading: Company Profile Strength
profileStrength.content: Continue to fill your profile in order to benefit from better visibility in the network and get more business opportunities.

connections.heading: Connections
connections.content: By connecting additional services offered by the business network, you can enhance visibility and control over your business processes.

SupplierInformation.notExists: Supplier does not exist! Please register first.

ApplicationFormButton.sendToCustomer: Finish data entry and request approval
ApplicationFormButton.sendToCustomerConfirmation: Do you really want to finish data entry? As soon as you send the data for approval, no more editing will be possible.

rejectionReason.label: Please state your reasons for rejecting data provided by the supplier

ApplicationFormLabel.successSendToCustomer: Entry of data was successful. As soon as your data has been approved, you will be informed via email.

ApplicationFormLink.header: The following section contains the current version of our Warehouse Terms and Conditions.
ApplicationFormLink.ladenbau: General Terms of Delivery for Store Construction Warehouses
ApplicationFormLink.regional: General Terms of Delivery for Regional and Central Warehouses
ApplicationFormLink.graphic: This ${separation} depicts the meaning of the Incoterms.

unsavedChangesConfirmation.title: Confirmation
unsavedChangesConfirmation.message: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to proceed?
